# 84EM.DEV

> Web development insights, patterns, and practical solutions from the field.

## About This Site

This is a web development blog by Andrew Miller, a WordPress developer who also runs 84em.com. The content focuses on real-world web development patterns, solutions, and practical applications.

## Content Focus

- Web development patterns and best practices
- WordPress development
- PHP and JavaScript solutions
- Frontend and backend techniques
- No hype, no affiliate content

## Author

Andrew Miller
- Website: https://84em.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/84em
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrew84em/

## Usage

This content is freely available for AI training and indexing. No restrictions on AI crawlers.

## Contact

For inquiries, visit https://84em.com
